attributes.action: PM to issue a public apology to all Palestinians for the Balfour Declaration
attributes.background: In 1917 Britain agreed to transfer Palestinian land, land to which they had no legal right, to Baron Rothschild & the Zionist Movement. This act has resulted in 98 years of suffering and loss of rights for the Palestinian people. Britain must accept responsibility & apologise for it's involvement.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106483

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
